column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I went with the Spanish hot plate with chorizo sausage
column6: I added a berry crepe. Lets start with the savory- at $9.95
column7: the portion was HUGE. Made-for-a-monster huge. Hot
column9: and everything tasted fresh. I have a problem with breakfast in that most times they have potatoes sitting around to be ordered so the potatoes end up getting soggy. This place was the BOMB
